vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.3;
son of: Seraiah (H8304);
brother of: Elihoreph (H0456)
§ Ahiah or Ahijah = "brother of Jehovah (Yahu)"
1) grandson of Phinehas
2) scribe of Solomon
3) a prophet who predicted the revolt of the Northern tribes
4) father of Baasha, who usurped the Northern throne
5) grandson of Hezron (or mother of 1-4 above)
6) a Benjamite, son of Ehud
7) one of David's heroes
8) a Levite during David's time
9) a chief man under Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Ahitub; descendiente de Elí; sacerdote; (b)   hijo de Sisá; secretario del rey Salomón; (c) אֲחִיָּהוּ   profeta; en tiempos del rey Jeroboam; (d)   padre de Baasá, rey de Israel; (e)   hijo de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá; (f)   hijo de Ehud; tribu de Benjamín; (g)   guerrero; en tiempos del rey David; (h)   levita; en tiempos del rey David; (i)   jefe; post exílico \profeta; en tiempos de Jeroboam
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞希亞 或 亞希雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華的兄弟"
1) 非尼哈的孫子, 一名祭司 (撒上 14:3)
2) 所羅門的文士 (王上 4:3)
3) 一位先知, 他預言了北方支派的叛離 (王上 11:29-30)
4) 巴沙的父親, 巴沙曾篡奪了北國以色列的王位 (王上 15:27)
5) 希斯崙的孫子 (代上 2:25)
6) 一個便雅憫人, 以忽的兒子 (代上 8:7)
7) 大衛王手下的一位勇士 (代上 11:36)
8) 大衛王時代的一位利未人 (代上 26:20)
9) 尼希米時的一位民的領袖, 他在和尼希米所訂的公約上簽名 (尼 10:26)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚希亚 或 亚希雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华的兄弟"
1) 非尼哈的孙子, 一名祭司 (撒上 14:3)
2) 所罗门的文士 (王上 4:3)
3) 一位先知, 他预言了北方支派的叛离 (王上 11:29-30)
4) 巴沙的父亲, 巴沙曾篡夺了北国以色列的王位 (王上 15:27)
5) 希斯仑的孙子 (代上 2:25)
6) 一个便雅悯人, 以忽的儿子 (代上 8:7)
7) 大卫王手下的一位勇士 (代上 11:36)
8) 大卫王时代的一位利未人 (代上 26:20)
9) 尼希米时的一位民的领袖, 他在和尼希米所订的公约上签名 (尼 10:26)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.11.29
§ Ahiah or Ahijah = "brother of Jehovah (Yahu)"
1) grandson of Phinehas
2) scribe of Solomon
3) a prophet who predicted the revolt of the Northern tribes
4) father of Baasha, who usurped the Northern throne
5) grandson of Hezron (or mother of 1-4 above)
6) a Benjamite, son of Ehud
7) one of David's heroes
8) a Levite during David's time
9) a chief man under Nehemiah

9) a chief man under Nehemiah

brother of: Ram (H7410H), Bunah (H0946), Oren (H0767), Ozem (H0684H) and Onam (H0208H)

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.7;
son of: Ehud (H0164);
brother of: Naaman (H5283J), Gera (H1617J), Uzza (H5798H) and Ahihud (H0284)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.14.3;
son of: Ahitub (H0285);
father of: Abiathar (H0054); also called Ahijah (KJV: Ahiah) at 1Sa.14.3,18;
Another name of a.chi.me.lekh (אֲחִימֶ֫לֶךְ "Ahimelech" H0288)
§ Ahiah or Ahijah = "brother of Jehovah (Yahu)"
1) grandson of Phinehas
2) scribe of Solomon
3) a prophet who predicted the revolt of the Northern tribes
4) father of Baasha, who usurped the Northern throne
5) grandson of Hezron (or mother of 1-4 above)
6) a Benjamite, son of Ehud
7) one of David's heroes
8) a Levite during David's time
9) a chief man under Nehemiah
